attributes.action: I want the government to ban  live animals that have been fed GMO foods.
attributes.additional_details: There is no way of knowing whether home or imported foods produced  at home for  comsuption here have been fed GMO foods. In this country you need a travel permit for cattle  etc to see where they have been  and fed.
attributes.background: The EU states that GMO food must be labeled. But it does not say live animals that have ben fed GMO food should have a clear label on them and saying where they were produced and what feed they have had, Where they were imported from and exported  to.where .Organic vegetables have tighter regs.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like the laws in the UK to change, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you'd like to see.

If you'd like EU law to change, you can petition the European Parliament. You can find out more here: https://petiport.secure.europarl.europa.eu/petitions/en/home
